title: Can your arduino be used as a keyboard, or mouse?

fields.name: You want to use your arduino for a Humin Interface Device?
fields.value: Arduino has many boards that can be used as a mouse/keyboard nativly. This is reffered to as a HID.

fields.name: Boards that are NOT HID complient.
fields.value: Uno, Mega, Nano, Pro mini, are not capible of use as an HID device.

fields.name: Boards that ARE HID complient.
fields.value: Leonardo, (Pro)Micro, Any other 8u2/16u2/at90usb8/162/32u2/32u4 compatible board, Zero, MKR1000.
